articles.headline: 2026 NFL draft order: 19 Round 1 picks set, Raiders at No. 1
articles.description: The Raiders, Jets and Cardinals hold the top three picks in the 2026 NFL draft. See the rest of the order -- plus each team's top need.

images.name: Geno Smith [1296x729]
images.alt: Las Vegas Raiders quarterback Geno Smith (7) and running back Ashton Jeanty (2) enter the field against the New York Giants at Allegiant Stadium.

images.name: Stephen A., Finebaum in agreement on No. 1 pick in 2026 NFL draft
images.caption: Paul Finebaum and Stephen A. Smith explain why they are currently favoring Indiana's Fernando Mendoza over Oregon's Dante Moore as the top pick in the draft.

articles.headline: 2025 NFL playoffs: Bracket, schedule, wild-card matchups
articles.description: The NFL playoffs began on Jan. 10 with three full rounds before Super Bowl LX on Feb. 8. Here is the full schedule and bracket.

articles.headline: 2026 NFL offseason: Free agents, draft notes, predictions
articles.description: The NFL offseason has arrived for 19 teams. What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

images.name: INLINE-INDEX: NFL Offseason Guide [3000x1200]
images.alt: Joe Burrow, Shane Steichen, George Pickens, Abdul Carter

articles.byline: NFL Nation, Jeremy Fowler, Dan Graziano, Matt Miller, Jordan Reid, Aaron Schatz and Ben Solak

articles.headline: Jaylon Johnson, Bryce Young lead NFL wild-card round arrivals
articles.description: Before the wild-card round kicked off, players made sure to put their most fashionable foot forward.

images.name: Jaylon Johnson [1211x681]
images.caption: Jaylon Johnson went with a spiffy red suit and hat combo.

articles.headline: NFL wild-card highlights: Best plays, moments, touchdowns
articles.description: Check out the best of the best from wild-card weekend in the NFL.

images.name: Stephen A.: 'Biggest disappointment' of playoffs if Rams lose to Panthers
images.caption: Stephen A. Smith says it would be a massive disappointment if the Rams fail to beat the Panthers in the NFC Wild Card Game.

articles.headline: Panthers left tackle Ickey Ekwonu ruled out with knee injury
articles.description: Panthers left tackle Ickey Ekwonu suffered a knee injury and was ruled out of the rest of Saturday's NFC wild-card game against the Rams.
